Kalamazoo.Kalamazoo Christian High School:
Kalamazoo Christian High School is a high school in Kalamazoo, Michigan, serving students from ninth through twelfth grades.


== History ==
The history of Christian education in Kalamazoo starts with the establishment of the first Kalamazoo Christian elementary school in 1877 by the Walnut Street Church. The first Christian high school in Kalamazoo was established in 1939.
